name: Valdai
description:
My friend Lina brought some pictures from her trip to Valdai (one the biggest northern lakes in Russia).

I liked them a lot, but couldn't find any place and money to make a physical exhibition, so I decided to make it virtually. Since I'm really into gamedesign lately, it turned into a good beginner-level project for me.

Hope you'll enjoy it

***

Lina is an incredible photographer, you can find her on Instagram @s_vetki.na_vetku

She doesn't post much, sadly, but since I'm willing to continue doing such exhibitions, I have a chance to unfold more pieces of her work.

***

Music: "In A Landscape", written by John Cage, performed by Alexei Lubimov  

My contacts: @vanya.esde on Inst, @vanyaesde on Telegram
